titles.title: Expressing the support of the House of Representatives for the goals and ideals of Professional Social Work Month and World Social Work Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Shea-Porter moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1167.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 419 - 0 (Roll no. 121).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/17/2010--Passed House without amendment. Supports the goals and ideals of Professional Social Work Month and World Social Work Day.
